ValidationRule.description: Hold Reason field must be blank before progressing to the final stage to ensure accurate return processing
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(Hold_Reason__c))), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Refunded - Closed'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Partially Received') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please clear the Hold Reason field before progressing to the final stage. This field must be blank to ensure accurate return processing
